.. py:function:: get_default_input_attributes(kind, loading_parameters = None)

   Function to get the default attribute setup to read input from a certain file format.

   Used to set descriptions, long names, unit dimensions and unit names.

   :param kind: The kind of input format to get default settings for
   :type kind: Literal["sharc", "newtonx", "ase", "pyrai2md"]
   :param loading_parameters: User-provided overrides for default setup. Defaults to None.
   :type loading_parameters: LoadingParameters | None, optional

   :returns: The resulting set of attributes for each individual supported observable in a dataset.
   :rtype: dict[str, dict[str, str]]
